ticket.title: active_support/core_ext/object/returning.rb removed in 3.0.0.rc?
ticket.original-body:
active support 3.0.0.beta has the returning method. @@@ ~/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p174/gems/activesupport-3.0.0.beta4 λ ack 'def returning' lib/active_support/core_ext/object/returning.rb 38: def returning(value) @@@
